am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp.c File Reference

Driver for SHARP display panel with JDI interface (LS014B7DD01). More...

Detailed Description

Driver for SHARP display panel with JDI interface (LS014B7DD01).

#include "am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp.h"
#include "am_util_delay.h"
#include "am_bsp.h"
